headline: Super Micro Computer (SMCI) Stock Declines While Market Improves: Some Information for Investors

headline: Shortsellers targeted wider range of companies ahead of Trump's 'Liberation Day'
summary: Shortsellers targeted a wider range of equity sectors in March before U.S. President Donald Trump's April 2 "Liberation Day" tariff announcement and raised negative bets on a cluster of big tech stocks, data and tech firm Hazeltree said on Thursday.  Super Micro Computer emerged as the most crowded security, knocking oil and gas producer Chevron off the top spot, a position it had held for the past two months, the report showed.  Tech stocks had previously dominated the list of the top 10 most shorted U.S. large caps.
